title: Walkman: the music player revolution
description: About 40 years ago, portable music players became a craze with the launch of the Sony Walkman.

vocabItems.definition: pair of padded speakers worn over your ears in order to listen to music without other people hearing
(phrasal verb) suddenly start to be successful and popular
(idiom) risked losing something important, such as a job or reputation
(phrasal verb) noticed or gave particular attention to something being said or done
something marketed for sale to a small, specific group

vocabItems.word: caught the public imagination  caught the public's imagination
vocabItems.definition: caught the public imagination or caught the public's imagination(idiom) made the public interested in or excited about something
